About Me

Walt Edgecomb III

With nearly 40 years of experience in fitness and transformation coaching, I specialize in helping men over 40 achieve their health and fitness goals. As someone who went through my own transformation journey, I understand the unique challenges and opportunities that come with getting fit after 40.

My approach combines proven training methods, nutrition science, hormone replacement therapy (TRT),and lifestyle optimization to help you achieve sustainable results while maintaining balance in your life.
